article.headline: S.C. State 65, Howard U. 58
article.story: WASHINGTON (AP) -- Reserve center Chris Williams had 13 points and seven rebounds to lead South Carolina State to a 65-58 Mid-Eastern Athletic Conference victory over Howard University on Saturday. Derrick Davis added 10 points for the Bulldogs (8-13, 6-5), who won for only the second time in 13 road games. Darryl Hudson had 17 points to lead the Bison (7-14, 3-7), who have lost four straight and seven of their last eight. Julius Carter's putback gave South Carolina State a 59-51 lead with 1:15 remaining. He finished with nine points and seven rebounds. Julius Hearn's 3-pointer pulled Howard to 55-51 with 2:23 remaining but that was as close as the Bison got in the second half. Will Gant scored five straight points to pull the Bison to 55-47 with 3:52 remaining. Carter's three-point play gave the Bulldogs a 51-33 lead with 10:12 left. After Williams scored on back-to-back buckets from the paint, Travis Jones' driving layup extended South Carolina State's lead to 42-29 lead with 12:33 left. Jeron Smith's alley-oop dunk off an assist from Dominique Davis was one few second-half highlights for Howard. The Bulldogs, who rank second in the MEAC in field-goal percentage at 44 percent, shot 59 percent (13 for 22) in the first half and led 34-25 at halftime. Howard plays host to North Carolina A&T on Monday in the sixth game of a seven-game homestand. South Carolina State visits Maryland-Eastern Shore on Monday.

statistics.name: points
statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: fieldGoals
statistics.description: Field Goal makes and attempts.

statistics.name: freeThrows
statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).
